name: Sergio Marchesini, on GitHub
tagline: A place for my experiments. mostly in Js, Meteor, Php, Processing.
body:
Here's some links to my projects on github:

## [EuRiddm](/euriddm-processing/)
![Euriddm](http://smarques.github.io/euriddm-processing/img/Euriddm2.png)
3-channel audio pattern generator using Euclidean Rhythms. Made with Processing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
